name: hasDataSince

metadata.description:
hasDataSince Sensor


Checks if a resource has received data from a specific metric since a moment in time.

States
  • True
  • False

Raw data
  • lastTimestamp: epoch timestamp of last data point

Properties
  • resource: The resource you want to check for data
  • metric: The metric you want to check for data
  • since: epoch time in milliseconds or ISO_8601 duration
